channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Column No 51 Beckenham Road (on War Memorial Roundabout), 20th November
item.description:
Reporting this as Riney staff were not aware of this….(?) Two weeks ago this street lamp column was cut down to above inspection door level…..it was not involved in a road traffic accident, so not known why removed . The roundabout is generally poorly lit by the current LED lamps so with this column out of action it has left this section of road and pavement even more poorly illuminated. Please do not leave this column to be replaced for months on end like the column in Croydon Rd (No 6) that still after 9 months is still without lamp despite new column being connected to the Board last week.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 245, High Street, Beckenham, London Borough of Bromley
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Outside 70 Messina Avenue NW6 4LE, 20th November
item.description:
Good Afternoon, I hope you are well. I kindly ask to provide assistance for a Tree that needs to be checked as it looks sick since over a year- no leaves at all -see pictures attached. Please assist. The tree is outside 70 Messina avenue. Is the only sick tree so impossible to miss it. Many thanks, Valeria
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 68, Messina Avenue, Kilburn, Hampstead, London Borough of Camden
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Dumped fridge, sofa and other bulky waste, 20th November
item.description:
Despite the helpful signage council officers put in, fly tipping has started again on the green. Fridge on corner of Warnham Road and Lewes. White polystyrene or wood by the electricity box at the bottom of the hill opposite Buxted Road turning. And a broken sofa on a Warnham Road, down the side of the allotment gate (no photo attached but very obvious).

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Warnham Road, Friern Barnet, East Finchley, London Borough of Barnet
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Outside 76/78 Brondesbury Rd., 20th November
item.description:
Piles of leaves blocking gutter here and elsewhere on the street. It seems to get swept at the top end of Brondesbury Rd (nearest to the tube) but not further down.

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Brondesbury Road, London
